content.title: Welcome to US Medieval Roleplay!
content.text:
The age of dragons, blades, and survival begins...

- Explore a living medieval world filled with PvP, RP, and Fantasy!
- Stay updated here, on our Wiki, and Discord for events and updates.

<TextStyle.Green>Recent Updates:</>
- Added Dark Age 2 Weapons, HUDAscended, ArkNav
- Removed unused mods for performance
- Adjusted Dino Spawn Rates and PvP timers

content.title: Primitive Survival
content.text: No Tek, No Guns — just bows, swords, tames, and traps. Build smart, hide well, and outplay your enemies.

content.title: Rich RP Systems
content.text: Create towns, kingdoms, and alliances through roleplay. Run shops, events, and claim titles. RP supported.

content.title: Fantasy Tames
content.text: Tame dragons, gryphons, meraxes, and magical beasts. Many have special evolution paths or powers.

content.title: Balanced PvP
content.text: Raiding allowed but tuned — structure resistance x0.8, damage x1.5. PvP is strategic, not zerg-based.

content.title: Server Rates & Info
content.text:
XP: 1.0x | Taming: 1.5x | Gathering: 1.5x

� Tribe Size Limit: 8
� No Alliances (Trading OK)
❌ No Wipes — your world is persistent.

content.title: Installed Plugins
content.text:
- Better Spawn Distribution
- No Building on Spawn Points
- UnicodeRCON ASA
- Auto Dino Settings
- Automated Dino Wipes
- WBUI2 Interface
(More info in Discord / Wiki)

content.title: Creatures & Tames
content.text:
Dragon's Kingdom – Tame & evolve dragons using Alpha Dragon Tooth
 Marnii Griffins – Fantasy griffins with high mobility
 Meraxes – KO tame with unique powers
� Atlas Big Cats – Tigers & lions
� Gryphons – Lightweight flying beasts

content.title: Structures & RP Deco
content.text:
CKF – Modular medieval castle system
 Arkitect Structures – ASR Primitive Bench & advanced snap points
� RR Medieval Deco – Immersive decor
 RR RP Deco – Roleplay props
 Wall'n'Floor – Trim pieces
� Fery's Pathways – Aesthetic paths

content.title: Gear, UI, QoL
content.text:
Cliffans Wardrobe – Clothing sets
 Cliffans Backpacks – Boost carry weight
⚔ Cliffans Weapon Skins – Recolors of vanilla weapons
� HUD Durability – See item HP on screen
� HUDAscended – Clean modern HUD
� ArkNav – Map & GPS
 Better Rafts – Faster, reverse-enabled

content.title: Utilities & Survival
content.text:
Primitive Weaponry – Crossbows, spears, flintlocks
 Dark Age Weapons – More melee types
 Survival Ambience – Fog, mood, realistic darkness
� Return The Beacons – Corpse/dino locators
 ASA API Utils – Plugin base
 Admin Tools – Essential server features
 LudopARK Casino – Mini games & prize systems

content.title: Frequently Asked Questions
content.text:
<TextStyle.Yellow>How do I tame a dragon?</>
- Knock out with arrows or modded weapons, use special saddle from Dragon's Kingdom bench.
- To evolve, collect an Alpha Dragon Tooth.

<TextStyle.Yellow>What are Bushberries (BB)?</>
- BB are your in-game currency, earned by playing, voting, ranking up, and events.

<TextStyle.Yellow>Where can I find help?</>
- Use this menu, visit the Wiki, or ask in Discord!

content.title: Player Commands (Coming Soon)
content.text:
- <TextStyle.Yellow>/rank</> → View your current rank and playtime.
- <TextStyle.Yellow>/top</> → See the top-ranked players on the server.
- <TextStyle.Yellow>+register</> → Begin linking your Discord (see Discord for full process).

<TextStyle.Red>Note:</> These features are under construction.
Stay tuned via Discord for live feature updates.
